edu.neu.ccis.sms.dao.categories

Class UserToMemberMappingDaoImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.neu.ccis.sms.dao.categories.UserToMemberMappingDaoImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UserToMemberMappingDao

    public class UserToMemberMappingDaoImpl
extends Object
implements UserToMemberMappingDao
    DAO implementation class for UserToMemberMapping entity; This DaoImpl class provides access methods for user-to-member registration entities
    Author:
    Pramod R. Khare, Swapnil Gupta
